DOC.brief_summary: This prospective cohort multi-site study aim develop Taiwan version ( ID Pain-T ) base original version ID Pain also DN4 , validate ID Pain-T DN4 apply Taiwanese subject clinical setting .
DOC.brief_title: Development Validation Taiwan Version ID Pain Questionnaire ( ID Pain-T ) DN4 Questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Subjects without headache pain 30 day least 18 year old visit clinic , inclusive male female . Subjects able complete ID PainT Questionnaire . Subjects illiterate unable complete questionnaire . Subjects currently participate another study participate another pain study within one month study entry . Subjects low back pain unable participate study ; sciatica cause piriformis ( exclusive type sciatic pain ) , lumbago , unclear identification nerve injury ( e.g . complex regional pain syndrome type I ) mix origin ( e.g . cancer pain ) .
